workflow.name: Automate employee onboarding with GPT-4o: Jira, Notion & Gmail integration
workflow.description:
## üìò Description
This workflow automates the employee onboarding process by creating Jira accounts, generating Notion onboarding checklists, crafting AI-generated welcome messages, and sending personalized welcome emails ‚Äî all automatically.
 It provides a complete hands-free onboarding experience for HR and IT teams by connecting Jira, Notion, Google Sheets, Gmail, and Azure OpenAI.
 Failures (like Jira account creation errors) are logged into Google Sheets to ensure full transparency and no missed onboardings.

- ## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)
- üü¢ When Clicking ‚ÄúExecute Workflow‚Äù
Manually triggers the entire onboarding automation. Useful for testing or initiating onboarding on demand for a new hire.
- üë§ Define New Hire Profile Data
Structures all essential employee information into a clean dataset including name, email, start date, buddy, and access links (Slack, GitHub, Jira, Notion).
-  Acts as the single source of truth for all downstream systems ensuring consistent, error-free onboarding data.
- üé´ Create Jira User Account
Automatically creates a Jira account for the new employee using REST API calls.
-  Includes email, display name, username, and product access (Jira Software).
-  Removes the need for manual admin setup and ensures immediate access to project boards.
- ‚úÖ Validate Jira Account Creation Success: Checks if the Jira API response contains a valid accountId.
-  If successful ‚Üí continues onboarding.
-  If failed ‚Üí logs error to Google Sheets.
-  Ensures downstream steps don‚Äôt continue if Jira setup fails.
- üìä Log Jira Provisioning Failures to Error Sheet
- Appends any account creation errors (duplicate emails, invalid permissions, or API issues) into an ‚Äúerror log sheet‚Äù in Google Sheets.
-  Helps HR/IT monitor issues and manually resolve them.
-  Guarantees no silent onboarding failures.

üìã Generate Notion Onboarding Checklist
- Creates a personalized Notion page titled ‚Äú{Name} - Onboarding Checklist‚Äù that includes:
- Welcome message
- Access links (Slack, GitHub, Jira)
- Assigned buddy details
- Start date and status
- Optionally, embedded videos or docs
-  Gives each new hire a structured hub to manage onboarding tasks independently.

- ü§ñ AI-Generated Welcome Message Creator
- Uses GPT-4o (Azure OpenAI) to craft a friendly, motivational welcome message for the new employee.
-  Incorporates name, buddy, and access details with emojis and warm tone.
-  Ensures every message feels human and engaging ‚Äî not robotic.
- üß† GPT-4o Language Model Configuration
- Configures the AI assistant persona for personalized onboarding messages.
-  Ensures tone consistency, friendliness, and empathy across all communications.
- üîó Consolidate Onboarding Data Streams
- Merges data from Jira, Notion, and AI message generation into a single payload.
-  This ensures the final email contains every onboarding element ‚Äî access links, checklist URL, and the AI-generated message.

üìß Format Comprehensive Welcome Email
- Generates a complete HTML-formatted email with:
- Personalized greeting
- AI-generated welcome message
- Clickable links (Jira, Notion, Slack, GitHub)
- Buddy info and start date
-  Designed for mobile responsiveness and branded presentation.
- üì¨ Send Welcome Email to New Hire
- Sends the final welcome email to the employee‚Äôs inbox with the subject:
- ‚ÄúWelcome to Techdome, {Name}! üéâ‚Äù
-  Includes all essential access information, links, and team introductions ‚Äî ensuring the new hire starts strong on Day 1.
- 
## üß© Prerequisites
Jira Admin API credentials
Notion API integration
Gmail OAuth2 credentials
Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o) access
Google Sheets document for logging errors

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Fully automated new hire onboarding
 ‚úÖ AI-generated personalized communications
 ‚úÖ Real-time error logging for IT transparency
 ‚úÖ Seamless integration across Jira, Notion, and Gmail
 ‚úÖ Professional first-day experience with zero manual work

## üë• Perfect For
HR teams managing multiple onboardings
IT admins automating access provisioning
Startups scaling employee onboarding
Organizations using Jira + Notion + Gmail stack

parameters.content:
## üìã Generate Notion Onboarding Checklist
**Action:**  
- Creates personalized onboarding checklist page in Notion.  
**Description:**  
- Dynamic page title: "{Name} - Onboarding Checklist"  
- Structured checklist content:  
  - Welcome header with team and emojis  
  - Access links (Slack, GitHub, Jira, Notion)  
  - Assigned buddy info for mentorship  
  - Start date and onboarding status tracker  
- Uses Notion Blocks API for rich formatting.  
- Returns page URL for welcome email.  
- Central hub for new hire onboarding tasks and resources.

## üë§ Define New Hire Profile Data
**Action:**  
- Structures new employee information for multi-platform onboarding.  
**Description:**  
- Consolidates data into a standardized format:  
  - Personal Info: Name, email, username  
  - Company Details: Organization, start date, assigned buddy  
  - Access Links: Slack, GitHub, Jira, Notion invitations  
  - Custom Messages: Welcome message template, checklist name  
- Acts as single source of truth for downstream nodes.  
- Ensures consistent format across Notion, Jira, email, and AI.

## üìä Log Jira Provisioning Failures to Error Sheet
**Action:**  
- Records Jira account creation errors in a Google Sheet.  
**Description:**  
- Captures failures like duplicate email, API auth errors, or invalid access.  
- Maintains queryable database for HR/IT troubleshooting.  
- Ensures onboarding failures don‚Äôt go unnoticed.  
- Critical for SLA compliance and smooth new hire experience.

## üé´ Create Jira User Account
**Action:**  
- Automatically provisions new Jira user account via API.  
**Description:**  
- Calls Jira REST API (`/rest/api/3/user`) with POST method.  
- Creates user with email, display name, username, and product access.  
- Eliminates manual admin account creation.  
- Returns account ID for validation and error handling.  
- Requires Jira admin API credentials.  
- Ensures immediate access to Jira boards and issue tracking.

## ‚úÖ Validate Jira Account Creation Success
**Action:**  
- Confirms Jira user account creation was successful.  
**Description:**  
- Checks for valid `accountId` in API response.  
- **True Path:** Routes to Merge node to continue onboarding.  
- **False Path:** Routes to error logging for troubleshooting.  
- Catches duplicate emails, invalid credentials, permission issues, or rate limits.  
- Prevents incomplete onboarding propagation downstream.

## ü§ñ AI-Generated Welcome Message Creator
**Action:**  
- Generates personalized, warm onboarding message via GPT-4o.  
**Description:**  
- Leverages Azure OpenAI to craft messages using new hire info, buddy, role, and access links.  
- Maintains professional, motivational, and emoji-inclusive tone.  
- Message under 200 words for email compatibility.  
- Output used in emails and Slack messages.  
- Customizable per department or seniority via prompt adjustments.

## üßæ Format Comprehensive Welcome Email
**Action:**  
- Builds full HTML email with all onboarding resources and AI message.  
**Description:**  
- Personalized greeting and warm AI message.  
- Clickable links: Notion checklist, Jira board, Slack, GitHub.  
- Buddy assignment and start date included.  
- Mobile-responsive and professional template.  
- Output JSON formatted for Gmail node (to, subject, body).

## üìß Send Welcome Email to New Hire
**Action:**  
- Delivers comprehensive onboarding email to new hire inbox.  
**Description:**  
- Sends HTML email including AI message, access links, buddy info, and start date.  
- Subject: "Welcome to Techdome, {Name}! üéâ"  
- Optionally CC HR/manager for tracking.  
- Ensures new hire receives all onboarding info in one organized email.

## üß† GPT-4o Language Model Configuration
**Action:**  
- Configures GPT-4o model for generating onboarding messages.  
**Description:**  
- Sets system prompt defining onboarding assistant persona.  
- Ensures consistent tone and style across all messages.  
- Handles edge cases like missing buddy or delayed start dates.  
- Optimized for friendly, professional output.

assignments.name: welcome_message
assignments.value: Welcome newscctv to Techdome‚Äôs Developer Team üéâ

nodes.name: Log Jira Provisioning Failures to Error Sheet

blockValues.textContent: =üëã Welcome {{$json["name"]}} to Techdome‚Äôs Developer Team üéâ    Your onboarding journey starts today! Here‚Äôs everything you‚Äôll need to get started:    - üí¨ **Slack Access:** [Join Workspace]({{$json["slack_invite_link"]}})   - üíª **GitHub Access:** [Join Organization]({{$json["github_invite_link"]}})   - üßæ **Jira Project Board:** [View Tasks]({{$json["jira_project_link"]}})   - üóíÔ∏è   You‚Äôll be guided by your buddy **{{$json["buddy"]}}**, who will help you with setup and initial tasks.    Let‚Äôs make your first week a great start üöÄ   Status: *Invited* | Start Date: {{$json["start_date"]}}

parameters.text:
=You are Techdome‚Äôs onboarding assistant. 
Compose a warm, friendly onboarding message for a new developer.

Here‚Äôs the new hire data in JSON:
{{ JSON.stringify($json) }}

Use the details to:
- Welcome the developer by name
- Mention their buddy
- Share joining links (Slack, GitHub, Jira, Notion)
- Add a short motivational line at the end

Keep the tone conversational and include emojis (üéâ üöÄ üí¨ üíª üßæ).
Format the message as text for email or Slack.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an assistant that specializes in generating onboarding messages for new employees.
Make the message sound welcoming, professional, and motivating. Keep it under 200 words.

parameters.content:
## üîó Consolidate Onboarding Data Streams
**Action:**  
- Merges data from Jira, Notion, and AI-generated message for unified email payload.  
**Description:**  
- Combines:  
  1. Jira account info  
  2. Notion checklist URL  
  3. AI-generated welcome text  
- Prevents premature email sending with ‚ÄúWait for All Input‚Äù mode.  
- Critical integration point ensuring new hire receives complete information.

nodes.name: Send Welcome Email to New Hire

main.node: Send Welcome Email to New Hire
Log Jira Provisioning Failures to Error Sheet

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
